comments.comment: When the time comes where Sergeants and soldiers explaining the COVID-19 situation, then the public realize that things are very wrong.
Where is Covid Special task force members. Where is Dr Seetha A.

Where is the Corona committee and Quarantine officers?? Government has given bonus funeral fiesta to Nuwara eliya for six days. Poor public had to buried within 8 hours without family members. Politicians are given enormous chance to publicly for elections thru dead body. It was PM who started this gala funeral fiesta by hugging Jeewan at Talangama violating law
